title: Rising electric bills lead to state scrutiny — but little relief for residents
description: Many state leaders are considering rate freezes, additional energy assistance funds or new rates targeting large energy users such as data centers.
content: Many state leaders are considering rate freezes, additional energy assistance funds or new rates targeting large energy users such as data centers.
